name: PEACEFUL AND CROWDED HANOI
description: This trip includes 3 location: + Chua Boc ( A temple) + Street food + Ho Dac Di (a beautiful lake) Going on this trip you will experience different tastes of Hanoi. You may get to know more about Buddhism in Vietnam and enjoy the most peaceful view here. After enjoying the fresh air and the tranquil environment, I will excite you with a totally different vibe - The street food jam. You will have the chance to join the crow, to taste the most incredible street food, to see the beautiful sun set.
